message: It gladens my heart to see you in pain, All you care about is your feeling and fame Not because of you I will settle for depression, I've seen worst and also the implications ,Did you have a magnet on when I feel for you,it was like an attraction ,You were my rare sight of distraction, Why couldn't I see it earlier ,That you were the stone in my way ,That I stumbled upon because of your ray ,We are now on separate page ,For all I care, nothing about your rage
